title: (Request) Be able to change the numbers on anything for special custom games.
body:
Could riot possibly allow us to tweak any number (damage, range etc) in special custom games for fun? I would love to try leblanc with global range W. I'm sure plenty of players would find things to have fun with (ez .1 second Q or whatever your imagination comes up with). 

Maybe it could be done via a config text file we can tweak or something.

replies.body: that would be 10 times harder than just making a sandbox mode, something thats more realistic, relevant to actual gameplay, and probably more desired
Not sure about that, how do you think they balance and change numbers in the first place?
you mean like a sandbox mode? sorry that would create toxic behaviour in league

Yeah, well it would mainly be for mucking around with AI and mates. 
There could also be fun game variants created out of it. All the changes could be listed in the game lobby so people know.
